titles.title: A bill to designate a mountain in the State of Alaska as Mount Denali.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on National Parks. Hearings held. With printed Hearing: S.Hrg. 112-578.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

bill.summary: 3/29/2012--Introduced. Designates a specified mountain in Alaska as "Mount Denali."
